snippet: Negotiations between rebels and the government, now seem in danger of not happening, as both sides appear to be rearming.
abstract: Congolese rebels threaten to pull out of peace talks with the Congolese government, after accusing the Congolese military of arming militias to reinforce positions along the front lines in eastern Congo.
lead_paragraph: Negotiations between rebels and the government, now seem in danger of not happening, as both sides appear to be rearming.

headline.seo: Congolese Peace Talks Threaten to Stall
headline.main: Prospects for Congolese Peace Talks Grow Shakier
